name: combination
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 [ C or U ] the mixture you get when two or more things are combined: Strawberries and cream - a perfect combination. A combination of tiredness and boredom caused me to fall asleep. This drug can be safely used in combination with other medicines. Her experience and energy are a winning combination (= a successful mixture) in business.
[ C ] an arrangement in a particular order: From the letters X Y Z, we can get three combinations of two letters: XY, XZ, and YZ.
[ C ] a set of letters or numbers in a particular order that can be used to open some types of locks: He forgot the combination for his bike lock.
More examplesFewer examplesChampagne and caviar make a wonderful combination.The school uses a combination of modern and traditional methods for teaching reading.She wears the most hideous colour combinations you could ever imagine.The bride's mother was wearing a horrible combination of green and yellow.That combination of tiredness and alcohol is extremely dangerous.Only two people know the combination for the safe.
